verses.verse: וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> of burnt offering עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <S%H2568><s%> five אַמּ֨וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits אָרְכּ֜וֹ <S%H753><s%> [was] the length וְחָֽמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> thereof and five אַמּ֤וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits רָחְבּוֹ֙ <S%H7341><s%> the breadth רָב֔וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> thereof [it was] foursquare וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> the height

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H7161><s%> the horns עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> thereof on the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <S%H6438><s%> corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> being קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> of it the horns וַיְצַ֥ף <S%H6823><s%> thereof were of the same and he overlaid אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> it with brass

וַיַּ֜עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסִּירֹ֤ת <S%H5518><s%> the pots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיָּעִים֙ <S%H3257><s%> and the shovels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְרָקֹ֔ת <S%H4219><s%> and the basons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְלָגֹ֖ת <S%H4207><s%> [and] the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּחְתֹּ֑ת <S%H4289><s%> and the firepans כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> all the vessels עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof made נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> he [of] brass

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made לַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> for the altar מִכְבָּ֔ר <S%H4345><s%> grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> act רֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> network נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> a brasen תַּ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath כַּרְכֻּבּ֛וֹ <S%H3749><s%> under the compass מִלְּמַ֖טָּה <S%H4295><s%> thereof beneath עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> reaching חֶצְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H2677><s%> unto the midst

וַיִּצֹ֞ק <S%H3332><s%> And he cast אַרְבַּ֧ע <S%H702><s%> four טַבָּעֹ֛ת <S%H2885><s%> rings בְּאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> for the four הַקְּצָוֹ֖ת <S%H7099><s%> ends לְמִכְבַּ֣ר <S%H4345><s%> of the grate הַנְּחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass בָּתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> [to be] places לַבַּדִּֽים׃ <S%H905><s%> for the staves

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <S%H905><s%> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> [of] shittim וַיְצַ֥ף <S%H6823><s%> and overlaid אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> them with brass

וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּדִּ֜ים <S%H905><s%> the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֗ת <S%H2885><s%> into the rings עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on צַלְעֹ֣ת <S%H6763><s%> on the sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בָּהֶ֑ם נְב֥וּב <S%H5014><s%> the altar hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <S%H3871><s%> with boards עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> it withal he made אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> ס

וַיַּ֗עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיּ֣וֹר <S%H3595><s%> the laver נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כַּנּ֣וֹ <S%H3653><s%> and the foot נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of it [of] brass בְּמַרְאֹת֙ <S%H4759><s%> of the lookingglasses הַצֹּ֣בְאֹ֔ת <S%H6633><s%> of [the women] assembling אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who צָֽבְא֔וּ <S%H6633><s%> which assembled פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation ס

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶחָצֵ֑ר <S%H2691><s%> the court לִפְאַ֣ת ׀ <S%H6285><s%> side נֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> on the south תֵּימָ֗נָה <S%H8486><s%> southward קַלְעֵ֤י <S%H7050><s%> the hangings הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> of the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֔ר <S%H7806><s%> [were of] fine twined מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> Their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and their brasen וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [were of] silver

וְלִפְאַ֤ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> And for the north מֵאָ֣ה <S%H3967><s%> [the hangings were] an hundred בָֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> their pillars עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets עֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver

וְלִפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> And for the west קְלָעִים֙ <S%H7050><s%> [were] hangings חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <S%H2572><s%> of fifty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5982><s%> their pillars עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <S%H6235><s%> ten וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> ten וָוֵ֧י <S%H2053><s%> the hooks הָעַמֻּדִ֛ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver
וְלִפְאַ֛ת <S%H6285><s%> side קֵ֥דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> And for the east מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <S%H520><s%> cubits

קְלָעִ֛ים <S%H7050><s%> The hangings חֲמֵשׁ־ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> teen אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכָּתֵ֑ף <S%H3802><s%> of the one side עַמּוּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

וְלַכָּתֵ֣ף <S%H3802><s%> side הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> And for the other מִזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> he וּמִזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> he לְשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court קְלָעִ֕ים <S%H7050><s%> on this hand and that hand [were] hangings חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> fif עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <S%H6240><s%> teen אַמָּ֑ה <S%H520><s%> cubits עַמֻּדֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5982><s%> their pillars שְׁלֹשָׁ֔ה <S%H7969><s%> three וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <S%H7969><s%> three

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All קַלְעֵ֧י <S%H7050><s%> All the hangings הֶחָצֵ֛ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <S%H7806><s%> [were] of fine twined

וְהָאֲדָנִ֣ים <S%H134><s%> And the sockets לָֽעַמֻּדִים֮ <S%H5982><s%> for the pillars נְחֹשֶׁת֒ <S%H5178><s%> [were of] brass וָוֵ֨י <S%H2053><s%> the hooks הָֽעַמּוּדִ֜ים <S%H5982><s%> of the pillars וַחֲשׁוּקֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver וְצִפּ֥וּי <S%H6826><s%> and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H7218><s%> of their chapiters כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver וְהֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like מְחֻשָּׁקִ֣ים <S%H2836><s%> [were] filleted כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> and all עַמֻּדֵ֥י <S%H5982><s%> and all the pillars הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> of the court

וּמָסַ֞ךְ <S%H4539><s%> And the hanging שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> for the gate הֶחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> of the court מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> was the work רֹקֵ֔ם <S%H7551><s%> of the weaver תְּכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> linen מָשְׁזָ֑ר <S%H7806><s%> and fine twined וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> [was] the length וְקוֹמָ֤ה <S%H6967><s%> and the height בְרֹ֙חַב֙ <S%H7341><s%> in the breadth חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> [was] five אַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> cubits לְעֻמַּ֖ת <S%H5980><s%> answerable קַלְעֵ֥י <S%H7050><s%> to the hangings הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> of the court

וְעַמֻּֽדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5982><s%> And their pillars אַרְבָּעָ֔ה <S%H702><s%> [were] four וְאַדְנֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H134><s%> and their sockets אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> four נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> [of] brass וָוֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H2053><s%> their hooks כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver וְצִפּ֧וּי <S%H6826><s%> and the overlaying רָאשֵׁיהֶ֛ם <S%H7218><s%> of their chapiters וַחֲשֻׁקֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2838><s%> and their fillets כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> [of] silver

וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַיְתֵדֹ֞ת <S%H3489><s%> And all the pins לַמִּשְׁכָּ֧ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle וְלֶחָצֵ֛ר <S%H2691><s%> and of the court סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> [were of] brass ס

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> This פְקוּדֵ֤י <S%H6485><s%> is the sum הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle מִשְׁכַּ֣ן <S%H4908><s%> [even] of the tabernacle הָעֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> of testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> as they פֻּקַּ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> as it was counted עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according to the commandment מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses עֲבֹדַת֙ <S%H5656><s%> [for] the service הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites בְּיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand אִֽיתָמָ֔ר <S%H385><s%> of Ithamar בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> to Aaron הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וּבְצַלְאֵ֛ל <S%H1212><s%> And Bezaleel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אוּרִ֥י <S%H221><s%> of Uri בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son ח֖וּר <S%H2354><s%> of Hur לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עָשָׂ֕ה <S%H6213><s%> made אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וְאִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> With אָהֳלִיאָ֞ב <S%H171><s%> And with him [was] Aholiab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son אֲחִיסָמָ֛ךְ <S%H294><s%> of Ahisamach לְמַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe דָ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> of Dan חָרָ֣שׁ <S%H2796><s%> an engraver וְחֹשֵׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> and a cunning workman וְרֹקֵ֗ם <S%H7551><s%> and an embroiderer בַּתְּכֵ֙לֶת֙ <S%H8504><s%> in blue וּבָֽאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <S%H713><s%> and in purple וּבְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> scarlet וּבַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <S%H8336><s%> and fine linen ס

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַזָּהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> All the gold הֶֽעָשׂוּי֙ <S%H6213><s%> that was occupied לַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> for the work בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> in all the work הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> even זְהַ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> [place] even the gold הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <S%H8573><s%> of the offering תֵּ֤שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> and nine וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> was twenty כִּכָּ֔ר <S%H3603><s%> talents וּשְׁבַ֨ע <S%H7651><s%> and seven מֵא֧וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שֶׁ֖קֶל <S%H8255><s%> shekels בְּשֶׁ֥קֶל <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary
